verbose_text: This result was confirmed by the Annexin V-FITC apoptosis detection assay, which showed that the combined DDP and MG132 treatment induced more apoptosis in tumor cells than in DDP treatment alone (68.45 +/-2.58 vs. 23.5 +/-1.23%; P < 0.01, XREF_FIG).
evidence: DDP and MG132 treatment induced more apoptosis
